pages.text: Altars may be augmented with various different items. These items must be placed atop the altar for any effect to be rendered.

Augmenting items have tiers, and only the highest tier is regarded. This means, for example, that if a witch were to place both a wither skeleton skull and a normal skeleton skull on an altar, only the wither skull will apply any bonus, and the regular skull will be ignored.$(br2)The augmenting items are:$(br2) - Wither Skeleton Skull$(br) - Skeleton Skull$(br) - Torch
